Issue.creator: akm4
Issue.summary: Support for local crypto standards / implementations
Issue.description: There would be great to have an ability to use local cryptographic standarts, like russian GOST. As far as i know, the most convnient way to do it - plug through OpenSSL. Maybe there are other ways with Go, but i am not informed enough. Anyway, this feature will be a real enabler or vice versa a huge problem in promoting Fabric if not implemented.
